text: Günter Flauger (born 9 August 1936) is a German skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1960 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:German male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the United Team of Germany Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1960 Winter Olympics Category:People from Klingenthal
title: Günter Flauger
